q: he's no longer a judge on the show, the incomparable Simon Cowell is still doing his thing in the entertainment business, executive producing the show "X-Factor". Years ago, Simon Cowell wrote an excellent book I Don't Mean to Be Rude, But... in which he laid down five important principles that actors can use when auditioning. 1. Don't grovel when you come in. talking to somebody on Friday who I really, really want to be on the show and I'm waiting on a decision." When Matt Lauer asked for the identity of the individual, Simon Cowell responded: I can't say. I really, really at this point can't say; I'm sworn to secrecy. They'll be cute, and the guy won't be as good looking as me. That's one of the rules! Among the celebrities who have been linked to the judging panel are Katy Perry , Rihanna, Paula Abdul , Mariah Carey , Nicole Scherzinger and current X Factor UK judge Cheryl Cole . on the right thumb he badly sprained less than two weeks ago, he scored 17 of Philadelphia's last 26 points. "I was just trying to take what the defense gave me," Allen Iverson said. I didn't want to be overaggressive. I just wanted to let my teammates do what they had to do early in the game because they( Grizzlies) were taking away some of the shots I wanted by zoning up. Rafer Alston teammates held the fort, and then when I got an opportunity, I just tried to make the best of it. Allen Iverson made 10-of-24 shots, including 4-of-7 3-pointers. He added six assists and three steals and confounded the Grizzlies with his quickness. The 76ers never trailed over the last three quarters but played fast and loose with the
